title: 02/25/22 DPS Hour 1 - Doug Gottlieb & Jason Smith Guest Hosting
itunes:title: 02/25/22 DPS Hour 1 - Doug Gottlieb & Jason Smith Guest Hosting
description:
Coming off of Demar Derozan's game-winning shot Thursday night, Doug and Jason are reminded of how Lebron and the Lakers did not want to go after Derozan. That leads to a conversation about the Lakers and how Lebron will be perceived by fans in the end. Packers Insider Aaron Nagler from Cheesehead TV joins the guys to talk about what the latest is with Aaron Rodgers and to give his insight into how he thinks things will play out with the MVP and the Packers. Plus, Doug and Jason get into the Deshaun Watson situation in Houston.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
